extendedInfo.description: Are you ready for the next generation of online marijuana growing? Than get prepared for an all new cannabis farming experience! Brought to you by the creators of the top selling hit Weed Farmer.Weed Farmer Overgrown takes Virtual Marijuana Farming to a whole new level! Enjoy fresh challenges and advanced online features while benefiting from new real-time player interaction abilities.WFOG is a LARGE GAME, and requires an external download file and over 170 MB on your SD Card.Weed Farmer Overgrown is a Massively Multiplayer Online Game, and as such, it requires constant network connectivity to play.  Bandwidth use is small, typically under a few MB a month for average play.***** THE MOST ADVANCED MARIJUANA GROWING GAME EVER MADE!* Grow dozens of real life marijuana strains in both indoor and outdoor environments. Each strain has a unique look, grows twice as fast as in the first game and have different visuals for the flowers and buds by variety.* Loot system provides varied rewards and chances for uncommon, rare and ultra rare item drops including clones, growing equipment, seeds, crafting components, farm gear and much more.* Upgrade your grow location from a small starting closet to a massive warehouse. But don't stop there, Weed Farmer Overgrown allows you to continue expanding to the great outdoors to a maximum of 65 plots allowing you to grow up to 260 marijuana plants of different types at the same time!* Enjoy advanced player to player interaction with secure item trading for a true MMORPG experience.* Weed Farmer Overgrown is hosted on dedicated servers owned and maintained directly by the developers. * Hundreds of items can be acquired, consumed, grown, traded, sold and crafted. New items are added on a regular basis during special events & frequent content updates.* Crafting systems allow for creating various styles of hash, THC edibles, plant growing equipment and farming supplies. Three different crafting skills are available each with their own level progress.* Due to the size and large number of plants able to be grown at one time, mass automation is available which allow for batch fertilization, watering, spraying, planting and other grouped interaction with your crops.* Travel and Smoke-out Adventure Areas provide visiting to real world locations and smoking sessions. Randomized trivia questions related to marijuana are given with various rewards provided for correct answers.* Clones now have the rare chance to drop when harvesting a plant.* High Resolution graphics for tablets and other HD screens take full ability of even the newest and most advanced android devices.For more information about Weed Farmer Overgrown check out the official website of Weed Farmer at http://www.weed-farmer.com/First Production Release Version 1.0Weed Farmer Overgrown is now stable and works well on a majority of devices.  If you happen to have a device or network provider that gives you a less-than-optimal play experience, please be kind and leave us crash reports if this app crashes and/or write us at support@weedfarmerovergrown.com.

reviews.title: Working great!
reviews.comment: Still getting a few force closes but overall game is going great. Free weed bucks here... Refer me >>>> ZQKRMRER
reviews.author: Duce Dolla

reviews.title: Ugh
reviews.comment: Extremely expensive game compared to others. And always having problems with loading items n screens. If you charge people for a game make sure you do updates to help your CUSTOMER. Poorly programmed
reviews.author: Scott Rossiter

reviews.title: Wt is error 498
reviews.comment: I have bin charged bt game wnt install y wt is error 498 and it will not let me refund plz fix
reviews.author: Steven Craigs

reviews.title: Really cool game
reviews.comment: Needs some more content guys just some symple new strains and more alchemy and cooking please otherwise 5-5
reviews.author: Rory Graham

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Awesome game just takes alot of time to grow plants, and they need to hurry up and create more recipes atm there is only a few and they need player 2 player trading like it says they have
reviews.author: Josh Brown-vale

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Great game a little to slow for me
reviews.author: Scotty Conrad

reviews.title: A waste of $5
reviews.comment: I bought this expecting it to grow and new content to be added... nope. Developers must be too busy getting stoned with the money we spent. There\'s between like 1 update. Waste of good money.
reviews.author: Robert Kyles

reviews.title: game works and i love my little skunkies
reviews.author: wead trbly

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Would like the ability to purchase money. Make it faster for plants tp be finished
reviews.author: Devin Grinker

reviews.title: Great game but has bugs
reviews.comment: I have samsung galaxy ace and the game worked fine for me with nearly no issues. I done upgrade this morning and comes up with force close every time i try and load.
reviews.author: Steve Beacher

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: Would have gave 5 star but keeps freezing and force closing.
reviews.author: Larry R. Apfel Jr.

reviews.title: good but not perfect
reviews.comment: REFERRAL CODE - RSYOAZNQ  this game is fun, time consuming and I wish I could just buy extra weed bucks but overall good time killer
reviews.author: DJ Ludington

reviews.title: Why cant you make hash oil with dirtweed? This is no simulation
reviews.comment: This is not a simulation but more of an RPG and a poorly explained one at that. The time it takes to grow a plant is also quite long. It really should have a fast forward button. The game crashes frequently and has several bugs and the UI is slow, non responsive at times and many of the games more complex functions are completely unexplained. All in all, kind of a waste of 5 bucks.
reviews.author: mike reed

reviews.title: All around great
reviews.comment: A fun and realistic game backed up by great support makes this a five star game. Best game purchase I\'ve made.
reviews.author: Aaron Koch

reviews.title: What a let down!
reviews.comment: Too many bugs and glitches to be enjoyable.  Some buttons send me to the wrong places, some scrollable text fields get so glitchy they are unreadable (literally), and then the constant force close errors over and over...I\'m staying with the original weed farmer until this is fixed...
reviews.author: Jon Serwinowski

reviews.title: craft broken
reviews.comment: I have been playing this game for awhile, and I wasted nearly all my weedbucks trying to get engineering to work to create auto tender, auto feeders etc.   the problem is, for some reason the game will produce a \"failed to craft\" error (when crafting smart motor, smart actuator, auto-tender and auti-feeder) but at the same time it would deduct the required items from my inventory - leaving me with nothing.
reviews.author: Tyler Woods

reviews.title: Best game on the app store
reviews.comment: The more people who buy this game the better it will be. Pirates should stop stealing just cough up the cash and support the growbrothers and the google store should get off their high horse about the content of this game. The google store has plenty more other apps with explicit content worse than wfog. one last thing, those gooses who left the crappy rating should change them to five stars, you did once do it again, dont ruin a good programers income.  Five star rating for a five star game :D
reviews.author: John Dough

reviews.title: Dont buy trust me!
reviews.comment: Only play the free version. I bought this game and I regret it. The weed bus doesnt work and I can\'t buy anything.  This app alway crashes and no updates. I recently found out the game developer gave up on his paying customers due to pirates playing full version. What a waste o 6 dollars!
reviews.author: Damien Ward

reviews.title: Not happy
reviews.comment: Payed all this money for the game and do a update and now all it doz is crash cant even loads the game want a refund
reviews.author: Dennis King
